messages.message: The best thing we love about Yoora is it does two-way sync with Google Apps. It has helped us to better organize and keep everything on track.
messages.name: Lola Ross

messages.message: It has made our sales department more effective and efficient. It’s easy to use and it’s constantly updated. It’s easy to use and it’s constantly updated.
messages.name: Daisy Phelps

messages.message: Easy to use, reasonably priced, and ensures I don’t drop the ball on following up with my leads!
messages.name: Andrew Wilkins

blogs.description: In order to fully answer the question “What is a sales funnel?”, we need to tackle the different steps of the funnel. While different organizations have their own ways of managing and naming the sales process and customer touchpoints, these are usually structured into three distinct stages.
blogs.subTitle: 1. Top of the sales funnel: Awareness and discovery
